charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS did knowingly conspire and did possess with intent to distribute and did distribute 5 grams or more of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance all in violation of Title 21 United States Code 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and forfeiture allegations

21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE did knowingly possess with intent to distribute a quanity of a mixture containing methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance

21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE did knowingly possess with intent to distribute a quanity of a mixture containing methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance, and did aid and abett each other in the foresaid crime

21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS did knowingly conspire and did possess with intent to distribute and did distribute 5 grams or more of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance all in violation of Title 21 United States Code 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and forfeiture allegations

21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE did knowingly possess with intent to distribute a quanity of a mixture containing methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance, and did aid and abett each other in the foresaid crime

21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS did knowingly conspire and did possess with intent to distribute and did distribute 5 grams or more of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance all in violation of Title 21 United States Code 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and forfeiture allegations

21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE did knowingly possess with intent to distribute a quanity of a mixture containing methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance, and did aid and abett each other in the foresaid crime
